heading: rants & raves
subheading: date: mon, 18 oct 1999 19:06:26 -0400 from: “keegan, jim” (jkeegan@internal.massmutual.com) to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: lawsuit thanks for a great news story about an absolutely ridiculous infringement case (“a lot happening at quepasa,” 18.oct.99). what’s happening? que pasa? who ripping who off and who cares? you gave these people the publicity that they were looking for.
author: wired blogs
